projects.title: Unsupervised LLM Routing Map
bullets: Analyzed 4,875 UltraChat prompt–response pairs to map usage patterns at scale.
Discovered 189 prompt families and 75 response modes using unsupervised clustering.

projects.title: SafeLink – Mining Safety Monitoring Dashboard
bullets: Built a responsive dashboard streaming live environmental + machine telemetry.
Integrated 3 ESP microcontrollers and automated alerts for worker safety and machine health.

projects.title: Real-Time Image Analyzer (YOLO + OCR)
bullets: Implemented real-time object detection with YOLO and text extraction via OCR.
Optimized inference pipeline for live camera/video input with clean visual outputs.
